title: USC Has Fired Head Coach Steve Sarkisian In The Wake Of Alcohol Issues
text:
USC Has Fired Head Coach Steve Sarkisian In The Wake Of Alcohol Issues 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
In the wake of Steve Sarkisian’s problems with alcohol becoming public (and resulting in him seeking treatment), USC has decided they’ve...
